attributes.action: Legalise hunting animals in the uk with compound, recurve and crossbows.
attributes.additional_details:
Bow hunting is legal in many part of the world where hunting is popular, hunters cannot bow hunt due to these laws. Todays bows far exceed necessary requirements for a humane kill. Hunting has been common practice in rural parts of the country and this should include bow hunting.

For more infomation please visit:
http://www.britishbowhunterassociation.co.uk/

http://www.facebook.com/Legalize-Bow-Hunting-in-the-Uk-257491054275769/

http://www.teamwild.tv/tag/british-bow-hunting-association
attributes.background: Legalise hunting with crossbows recurve bows and compound bows. Game can be killed as humanely with a bow as they can with firearms such as shotguns. Hunting with a bow has been a tradition since man began using tools. It is a part of our heritage that many don't know about it should be revitalised.
